attributes.action: Changing Education For Kids Unknown Learning Difficulties
attributes.additional_details:
After meeting parliament on the 25 march about jobs and education i am starting this to get all kids to have a diagnostic test before the start of year 6 latest year 7 to diagnose dyslexia or learning difficulties to have the right help to be able to get the support to get the extra help kids need to be able to succeed in life and threw out school to have good G.C.S.E with the right help

please please help to get this going as kids do need help and are to shy to be able to tell anyone or know why they struggle
